fields.name: order.submit
fields.label: Submit Orders
fields.description: Allows the user to order servers and blueprints

fields.name: server.control_power
fields.label: Control Power on Servers
fields.description: Power on, power off, reboot, and pause servers

fields.name: server.manage_snapshots
fields.label: Manage Snapshots
fields.description: Create, delete, and restore from server snapshots

fields.name: server.add_disks
fields.label: Add Disks
fields.description: Allows the user to add disks to a server

fields.name: server.remove_disks
fields.label: Remove Disks
fields.description: Allows the user to remove disks from a server

fields.name: server.resize_disks
fields.label: Resize Disks
fields.description: Allows the user to resize disks on a server

fields.name: server.change_resources
fields.label: Change Resources
fields.description: Change CPU & memory on VMs

fields.name: server.remote_terminal
fields.label: Remote Terminal
fields.description: SSH/RDP access to servers from the CloudBolt UI

fields.name: server.manage_applications
fields.label: Manage Apps
fields.description: [Un]Install config manager applications on servers

fields.name: server.change_attributes
fields.label: Change Attributes
fields.description: Change env, group, OS family, and OS build associates for servers

fields.name: server.manage_labels
fields.label: Manage Labels
fields.description: Add and remove labels on servers

fields.name: server.manage_parameters
fields.label: Manage Server Parameters
fields.description: Add, remove, and modify parameters (AKA custom fields) on servers

fields.name: server.manage_credentials
fields.label: Manage Server Credentials
fields.description: Allows the user to view and manage the credentials used to execute remote actions on servers.

fields.name: server.view_handler_specific_details
fields.label: View Handler-Specific Details
fields.description: Allows the user to see resource handler specific details for servers. Ex. The VMware cluster, the AWS region, etc.

fields.name: server.all_actions
fields.label: Run All Server Actions
fields.description: Allows the user to execute any Server Action available on the server

fields.name: order.approve
fields.label: Approve Orders
fields.description: Allows the user to approve and deny orders

fields.name: order.change_attributes
fields.label: Change Order Attributes
fields.description: Change the order name

fields.name: resource.manage_parameters
fields.label: Manage Resource Parameters
fields.description: Add, remove, and modify parameters (AKA custom fields) on resources

fields.name: resource.all_actions
fields.label: Run All Resource Actions
fields.description: Allows the user to execute any Resource Action available on the resource

fields.name: group.manage_subgroup_quotas
fields.label: Manage Subgroup Quotas
fields.description: Allows the user to manage quotas for subgroups of this group

fields.name: blueprint.manage
fields.label: Manage Blueprints
fields.description: Allows the user to manage the creation/deletion/modification of Blueprints

fields.name: blueprint.create_parameters
fields.label: Create Blueprint Parameters
fields.description: Allows the user to create just Blueprint Parameters

fields.name: job.view_logs
fields.label: View Job Logs
fields.description: Allows the user to view and download job logs.

fields.name: job.cancel
fields.label: Cancel Jobs
fields.description: Allows the user to cancel jobs in progress.

fields.name: job.rerun
fields.label: Re-run Jobs
fields.description: Allows the user to re-run failed jobs.

fields.name: server.view_power_schedule
fields.label: View Server's Power Schedule
fields.description: Allows the user the see the schedule for recurring power control on the server

fields.name: server.manage_power_schedule
fields.label: Manage Server's Power Schedule
fields.description: Allows the user the edit the schedule for recurring power control on the server
